Project Manager, Music & Live Events (Concerts & Creative Programs) Job at Biz Afric Solutions




        
    

        
        Biz Afric Solutions - Our client is a music-focused foundation delivering concerts, live performances, and youth-focused creative programmes.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager, Music & Live Events (Concerts & Creative Programs)

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria (Hybrid, strong on-ground presence required)
Employment Type: Contract

About the Role
     

            
    




	They are seeking a hands-on Project Manager with deep experience in music and concert coordination, not a general project manager.
	This role requires someone who already understands how music events work in Lagos, knows the ecosystem, has coordinated live shows or concerts, and can confidently manage artists, vendors, venues, sponsors, and partners without hand-holding.
	If you have not managed music events, concerts, or large-scale creative productions, this role is not a fit.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan and deliver music events, concerts, and live creative programmes from concept to execution
	Coordinate artists, artist managers, sound engineers, stage managers, venues, and production vendors
	Manage timelines, rehearsals, technical requirements, and show-day execution
	Work directly with partners and sponsors for music events, ensuring deliverables and expectations are met
	Handle on-ground logistics during events, including artist movement, production setup, and run-of-show
	Track tasks, budgets, and deliverables using spreadsheets, trackers, or checklists
	Maintain clear communication with internal teams, creatives, partners, and vendors
	Anticipate and resolve issues quickly in fast-paced, high-pressure live environments


Requirements
Applicants must meet most of the following to be considered:


	Minimum of 3+ years of hands-on experience delivering music events, concerts, or live performances
	Proven experience coordinating artists, music vendors, venues, and production teams
	Demonstrated experience working with partners or sponsors on music or concert projects
	Strong understanding of the Lagos music and live events ecosystem
	Ability to manage multiple moving parts under tight timelines
	Strong organisational, follow-through, and execution skills
	Comfortable managing projects using spreadsheets, trackers, or simple PM tools
	Ability to be physically present for rehearsals, site visits, and event days in Lagos


Strong Advantages:


	Existing network within the music, concert, or live events space
	Experience working with music foundations, festivals, or youth-focused creative organisations
	Experience managing sponsor deliverables for live music events


Important Notes:


	This role is not suitable for general project managers without music or concert experience
	Please be honest in your responses; overstated experience will be screened out
	Ensure all Google Drive links submitted are accessible. Inaccessible links will result in automatic disqualification
	Recruitment managed by Biz Afric Solutions, a business advisory and talent consulting firm supporting organisations in building high-performing teams and executing mission-critical projects.


Salary Range
N200,000 – N280,000 per month (Negotiable, based on depth of music event experience).

We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin Officer

Job Location: Isolo / Ejigbo, Lagos
Industry: FMCG (Fast-Moving Consumer Goods)
Employment Type: Full-time, Onsite

Job Purpose
     

            
    




	The Admin Officer is responsible for providing administrative and operational support to ensure the smooth running of daily business activities.
	The role involves managing office logistics, maintaining accurate records, coordinating communication across departments, and supporting HR and procurement functions as needed.


Key Responsibilities
Administrative Operations:


	Manage the day-to-day running of the office and ensure a clean, organized, and functional work environment.
	Handle office correspondences, document filing, and record keeping (both physical and electronic).
	Coordinate logistics for meetings, official travels, and company events.
	Monitor and manage office supplies and stationery, ensuring adequate stock levels.
	Liaise with service providers for office maintenance, utilities, and equipment servicing.


Qualifications & Requirements


	OND/HND/B.Sc. in Business Administration, Public Administration, or related field.
	2–3 years of proven experience in administrative or office support roles (preferably in FMCG or manufacturing).
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Excellent communication, organizational, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong attention to detail, with the ability to multitask and work under minimal supervision.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruiter10@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
